alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 12:30AM CDT until June 26 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Morgan County in east Tennessee... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 130 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Helenwood to 9 miles west of Jamestown, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wartburg, Sunbright, High Point, Deerlodge, Coalfield and Frozen Head State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
